flawed_nl_solution:
The ones with nuts that they ate was 40% of the box because 80% x 0.5 = 40%
The ones without nuts that they ate equaled 25% of the box because 50% x 0.5 = 25%
They ate 62% of the box because 40 + 25 = <<40+25=62>>62
They left 38% of the box because 100 - 62 = <<100-62=38>>38
The box had 80 chocolates because 28 / 0.35 = <<28/0.35=80>>80
#### 80

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 65, not 62. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
